►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week we learned that Bill Gates never left & is still pulling strings at Microsoft, Microsoft is taking handheld gaming very seriously, either planning a dedicated Xbox handheld or a windows handheld UI or both, and the Rabbit R1 turns out to be just an android app.

Episode 196
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-gates-never-left
